Text:
One particular day, as the end of the year
approaches...

...So, to prevent robberies and pickpocketing leading
up to the Holidays, we are thinking of increasing the
patrols around town.

You mean, given there'll be more shoppers and pricier
items on display in the stores...

That's a valid point. I have no objections. Proceed
with the arrangements.

However, make sure the knights aren't overwhelmed
with work.
Yes, Princess! Understood!

(The Holidays...a relatively new tradition, but it
seems to have resonated with the general populace
far more than I imagined.)

(Giving gifts to loved ones, decorating with trees
and wreaths... These concepts are not well known
within the castle walls, but they're lovely.)

(I really ought to delve deeper into the everyday
lives of our citizens...)
Alexia.
I-Iris...?!
H-Hold on...! Why the rush? What's the matter?
I-It's nothing.

Then why did you bolt like that? Is something wrong?
If so, you can tell me about it—
I-I'm in a hurry!
Huh?

I'm, uh...meeting with a school friend. I've got to
go...!
Wait, Alexia...!
(I-Is she avoiding me...? Why...?)
It didn't end there...
Ah, Alexia. Can we chat for a moment—
I have training now...!
How about we train together—
I-I've been summoned by my teacher!
Alexi—
I'm off to patrol!
(Wait, is she really avoiding me? But why...?)
On one such day...
*sigh* She's escaped me again...

(I thought we were growing closer lately...but I
guess things aren't that simple.)
P-Please! Ma'am!
...What's going on? Is there a problem?

This area is exclusively for VIP customers.
Unauthorized entry is not allowed...
I'm looking for someone.

Are you looking for an acquaintance? If so, we can
help you find them...

Have you seen her? She's an elf, just like me.
Where is she? Any help would be appreciated.

Sorry, an elf? You are the only one I have seen
today...

I see. Very well. I'll look for her myself. Sorry for
the trouble.

B-But, Miss! This area is exclusively for VIP
customers...!

Sorry, she's with me. I'll accompany her, so can we
let it slide this time?
P-Princess Iris...! My apologies.

In that case, there's no issue at all. Would you like
us to prepare a private room for you...?

No, that won't be necessary. Please don't worry about
it.
Of course. Do let us know if you need anything.
Well...it's been a while, Lady Beatrix.

Thank you for your help, Princess Iris. They were
giving me a hard time and wouldn't listen to reason.
So it seemed. Are you here looking for your niece?

Yes. I hear this place is popular among youngsters.
They have quite a variety of items on display here...

This is a place where everyone enjoys shopping. That
said, finding your niece in this specific area might
prove challenging.

After all, this area is for the upper-class
aristocracy and certain affluent individuals.
I see... Have you come here to shop?
Yes, I'm looking for a Holiday gift.
A "Holiday gift"?
Lady Beatrix, are you familiar with the Holidays?

I've heard of it. They're selling Holiday-related
items everywhere in town.
In simple terms, it's like a winter festival...

It comes with a tradition of exchanging gifts with
loved ones. I thought I'd give it a try.

I see. What a lovely tradition. Hehe. Did you find a
good gift?

Yes. Not that I'd expect anything less from
Mitsugoshi. I'm sure my sister will love it...

...I'm sorry. That was insensitive of me, especially
when you're so concerned about finding your niece...

Don't worry about it. In fact, I plan on celebrating
the Holidays in my own way.

Once we're reunited, I'd like to exchange "Holiday
gifts" with her.

That's good to hear. It would be nice if you could
enjoy the Holidays while searching for her...

...I've got an idea! Lady Beatrix, there's a perfect
event that allows you to celebrate the Holidays
while searching for your niece.
Really?

Yes, the upcoming Saint Selection Ceremony...
Would you like to attend it with me?
